definitions.definition: A band passed under the belly of an animal, which holds a saddle or a harness saddle in place.
The part of an animal around which the girth fits.
One's waistline circumference , most often a large one.
A small horizontal brace or girder .
The distance measured around an object.
The length of the shortest cycle in a graph .

main_definition: A band passed under the belly of an animal, which holds a saddle or a harness saddle in place.
secondary_definitions: The part of an animal around which the girth fits.
( informal ) One's waistline circumference , most often a large one.
A small horizontal brace or girder .
The distance measured around an object.
( graph theory ) The length of the shortest cycle in a graph .
